data.title: Sloat Garden Center
data.meta_description: Expert advice in your backyard Situated at the base of northern Marin’s rolling hills, our Novato location is a colorful gardening paradise. Stop by today and stock up on a wide selection of fresh plants, high-quality garden tools, soils, pottery and expert garden advice – we have a wealth of experience gardening in Marin and […]
data.text:
Situated at the base of northern Marin’s rolling hills, our Novato location is a colorful gardening paradise. Stop by today and stock up on a wide selection of fresh plants, high-quality garden tools, soils, pottery and expert garden advice – we have a wealth of experience gardening in Marin and Sonoma.

We also offer garden design and delivery services.
